      • getAllConfigPaths

        default List<String> getAllConfigPaths(String directoryPath,
                                       boolean checkSubDir,
                                       Function<Path,Boolean> test)
                                throws IOException
        Get a list of config file paths from a directory
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - - directory to load the configs
        checkSubDir - - whether to load configs recursively when there's sub directory
        test - - callback to check if file is wanted
        Returns:
        - a list of config file paths
        Throws:
        IOException - - when directoryPath doesn't exist

        default List<Map<String,Object>> getConfigsFromDirectory(String directoryPath,

        Get a list of configs from a directory
        Parameters:
